node.title: Slips and surface flooding warnings for Taranaki
node.description: Heavy rain is expected to cause slips and flooding in Taranaki today, on the back of 24 hours of deluges.
node.content:
["Heavy rain is expected to cause problems on Taranaki roads today, with warnings predicting slips and flooding on the back of 24 hours of deluges.", "", "", "
File photo. Photo: 123rf
", "The Regional Council said river levels are being monitored cautiously but they are believed to have peaked early this morning, so it is unlikely they will reach critical flood levels.", "However further heavy rain expected for the region today means surface flooding and slips are expected.", "By mid-morning Waka Kotahi said State Highway 45 was closed between Opunake and Okato due to surface flooding.", "Taranaki Civil Defence said people should not drive or walk through floodwaters, because parts of the road could be washed away or contain debris.", "It said all floodwater should be treated as contaminated and unsafe."]
